Plot: Ten years after a massive terror attack on Israel, a young couple tries to survive the drab reality that took control over their lives. Tired and hopeless, Shachar and Oren go to sleep, hoping to find some peace.
Title: Awake
Writer: Yaron Baruch, Yaron Baruch, Paz Edry, Paz Edry, Ron Feldman
Actors: Ido Samuel, Danielle Jadelyn, Gal Vig
